attributes.action: Reinstate Section 2 of the Theft Act 1968. “A person is guilty of theft if by any deception he makes a pecuniary advantage for himself or for another.”
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reinstatement of section 2 of the theft act 1968 so that  “A person is guilty of theft if by any deception he makes a pecuniary advantage for himself or for another.”
This section has been repealed, which is why anyone can rip off the public with impunity.
